If you have any suggestions for a mid-release session, please contact us at onair@ubuntu.com. Make sure to put "Ubuntu On Air! Suggestion" as the subject of the email, and say what/who would you like to see in our next mid-release session.

We are open to any kind of suggestions, so please don't hesitate to contact us.
